# `lara-asp-migrator:sql-migration`

Create a new SQL Migration file.

## Usages

* `artisan lara-asp-migrator:sql-migration [--path [PATH]] [--] <name>`

## Arguments

### `name`

The name of the migration

## Options

### `--path=`

The path where the file should be created
